name: Rokit SEO
description:
Rokit SEO is an inbound marketing and search engine optimization firm located in the Oldtown Scottsdale Neighborhood in Arizona.
We make sure your company is relevant in all the ways that a business can be on the internet, and then we make sure it shows up on the first three pages of Google, Bing, and Yahoo!
We also specialize in website design, pay-per-click campaigns on Google and Facebook, E-Mail Marketing, Social Media Management, and even training and advising for each of our offerings.
